body:
# Version:
Password Trainer 0.0.1

# Instructions:

(Should work on Debian and Ubuntu.)

(Minor tweaks needed for other distros.)

sudo apt-get install bash zenity

cd ~

git clone https://github.com/adrelanos/PasswordTrainer.git

cd PasswordTrainer

chmod +x pwtrain

./pwtrain

# Contact:
adrelanos at riseup period net

# GPG public key:
https://github.com/adrelanos/aos
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: PasswordTrainer
tagline: PasswordTrainer can help remembering new and existing passwords. Should run on any GNU/Linux distribution. Depends on bash and zenity. Small source code. Bash script. Nothing compiled. Easy to verify.
